sources.title: Choose Your 'Weppins' (1935)
sources.description: Policeman Wimpy loses his handcuffed prisoner when he's distracted by a hamburger shop. The escapee drops into the weapon-filled pawnshop Popeye and Olive are running, and quickly gets in a fight with Popeye. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/choose-your-weppins-1935/

metadata.Plot: Policeman Wimpy loses his handcuffed prisoner when he's distracted by a hamburger shop. The escapee drops into the weapon-filled pawn shop Popeye and Olive are running, and quickly gets in a fight with Popeye.
metadata.Actors: William Costello, Mae Questel, Gus Wicke
